about_the_game:
PLEASE NOTE: We're still working hard on Generations! We are constantly adding new content and optimising the game even more. Hop in the game and enjoy Survival Mode by yourself or with friends!

In this stone age survival game, you must use all your skills to survive in a harsh and unforgiving environment. From crafting tools and shelter, to hunting and gathering food, you will need to do whatever it takes to stay alive. With all these conditions to contend with, will you survive?



Try to survive in a world filled with resources to collect and places to explore. Chop down trees, collect resources, break ores and build shelter!


You can play Generations by yourself, but it's even more fun with friends! The same experience, but with friends! Build insane structures or have PvP battles!


Build a small shack, a big house or a huge mansion! It all depends on you! What matters is you make some place to rest your head at night.

Key Features:

  • Survival system
  • Multiplayer
  • Nutrition system
  • Constant updates
  • Intuitive building system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 1030 or higher
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 1650
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

name: Generations

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 1030 or higher
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 1650
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
